LanguageData.Norbal_Scorpion.label: 스콜피온 석궁
LanguageData.Arbalest.label: 아바레스트
LanguageData.Arbalest.description: A large 석궁 with a special 기계장치 for drawing back and releasing the string.
LanguageData.Crossbow.label: 석궁
LanguageData.Crossbow.description: A weapon consisting of a bow fixed crosswise on a 목재en stock.
LanguageData.Bow_Recurve.label: 리커브 활
LanguageData.Bow_Recurve.description: A 리커브 활 stores more energy and delivers energy more efficiently than the equivalent straight-limbed bow.
LanguageData.NorbalBow_Grape.label: 스키타이 활
LanguageData.NorbalBow_Grape.description: A powerful 스키타이 활. Fires a heavy 화살 long distances.
LanguageData.blowgun.label: 바람총
LanguageData.blowgun.description: A 바람총 with a set of poison darts.
